content: this is pattern 3 in my 12 days of cowls a video for this pattern can be found here for extra help video 1 crochet level- intermediate about this pattern cowl can be made in two sizes using fingering/sport weight yarn or dk/worsted wt yarn there is no sewing the fringe is crocheted right onto the cowl for easy finishing happy stitching 1 https //www youtube com/watch v=4axmfwdxmv8
